price: Kuma kamar wancan ne abũbuwan shirkinsu suka ƙãwata wa mãsu yawa, daga mãsu shirkin; kashewar* 'ya'yansu, dõmin su halaka su kuma dõmin su rikitar da addininsu a gare su, Kuma dã Allah Yã so dã ba su aikatã shi ba. Sabõda haka ka bar su da abin da suke ƙirƙirãwa.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثِيرٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ قَتۡلَ أَوۡلَٰدِهِمۡ شُرَكَآؤُهُمۡ لِيُرۡدُوهُمۡ وَلِيَلۡبِسُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ دِينَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا فَعَلُوهُۖ فَذَرۡهُمۡ وَمَا يَفۡتَرُونَ
footnotes: * Sunã turbuɗe 'ya'ya mata, dõmin tsõron talauci kõ dõmin tsõron kunya. Sai mai haihuwa ta haihu a bãkin rãmi, idan mace ta haifa, sai ta tũra ta cĩkin rãmin ta rufe, idan kuma namiji ne sai ta bar shi. Haka kuma kashe 'ya'ya, a kan bãkance da alwãshi, sunã ganin sa ibada ne.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

translations: so that they may ruin them
